description: L(L(n)), where L(n) are Lucas numbers A000032.
references: T. Koshy (2001), Fibonacci and Lucas Numbers with Applications, John Wiley & Sons, New York, 511-516
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..15
prog: (MAGMA) [ Lucas(Lucas(n)): n in [0..20]]; // Vincenzo Librandi Apr 16 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), Mar 14 2003
